example_sentence_italian: Ho preso un autobus per andare in centro.
example_sentence_english: I took a bus to go downtown.

example_sentence_italian: Le corse degli autobus sono regolari.
Il prezzo del biglietto dell'autobus è aumentato.
example_sentence_english: The bus ticket price has increased.
I got on the wrong bus.

example_sentence_italian: Hanno aggiunto corse agli autobus serali.
example_sentence_english: They added runs to the evening buses.

example_sentence_italian: Sono scesi dagli autobus in fila.
example_sentence_english: They got off the buses in line.
It was hot on the bus.

example_sentence_italian: Si trova spesso caos negli autobus nelle ore di punta.
example_sentence_english: There is often chaos on buses during rush hour.
I left the book on the bus.

example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato molte persone sugli autobus affollati.
example_sentence_english: I found many people on the crowded buses.

example_sentence_italian: Viaggiano con gli autobus delle linee locali.
example_sentence_english: They travel with the buses of the local lines.

example_sentence_italian: nonstandard with vowel-initial nouns; prefer 'con l'autobus'
nonstandard with vowel-initial nouns; prefer 'con gli autobus'
example_sentence_english: La squadra viaggia coi autobus privati (uso colloquiale).
column15: The team travels by private buses (colloquial usage).
